mapper.select: select c.start_period,c.work_place, e.hourly_wage from Employee e,Contract c where e.C_code= c.C_code AND c.p_id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(rownum) FROM Employee WHERE M_code=#{m_code} AND rownum > 0

SELECT start_period,work_place,hourly_wage FROM (SELECT rownum rn, c.start_period,c.work_place,e.hourly_wage from Employee e,Contract c where e.C_code= c.C_code AND c.p_id=#{id} order by c.start_period desc) WHERE rn >= #{pageStart} AND rn <= (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})

SELECT sa_code, BASIC_SALARY, FOOD_EXPENSES, TRANSPORTATION_FEE, YEAR_MONTH, ACTUAL_SALARY, TOTAL_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, ADDITIONAL_EXTENDED, ADDITIONAL_NIGHT, em_code, work_place FROM salary_view WHERE m_code = #{m_code} ORDER BY sa_code asc

SELECT sa_code, BASIC_SALARY, FOOD_EXPENSES, TRANSPORTATION_FEE, YEAR_MONTH, ACTUAL_SALARY, TOTAL_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT, ADDITIONAL_EXTENDED, ADDITIONAL_NIGHT, em_code, work_place, work_hours, work_minute FROM salary_view WHERE m_code = 'p'||SUBSTR(#{id},INSTR(#{id},'/')+1) AND SUBSTR(em_code,0,INSTR(em_code,'/')-1) = SUBSTR(#{id},0,INSTR(#{id},'/')-1) ORDER BY sa_code desc
SELECT c.join_date, c.work_place, c.end_date, m.name FROM career c, member m WHERE c.m_code = #{m_code} AND c.m_code = m.m_code ORDER BY c.join_date desc

SELECT member.name, vw.sa_start, vw.sa_end FROM workrecord_view vw, member , employee e WHERE member.id = vw.sa_c and e.m_code = member.m_code and
substr(e.em_code,2,INSTR(e.em_code,'/',-1)-2) = #{id} and
'20190401' = substr(vw.w_code,INSTR(vw.w_code,'/',-1)+1,8)

SELECT n_code, m_code, title, job_type, personnel, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(end_date,'yy/mm/dd')) end_date, hour_wage, gender, age, term, work_day, work_time1, work_time2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p_date,'yy/mm/dd')) p_date, viewcnt, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(address,0,INSTR(address,' ',1,3)),INSTR(SUBSTR(address,0,INSTR(address,' ',1,3)),'/')+1) address, content, work_place_name, education, documents, interview, contact_number, career, employment_type, assigned_task, education_etc, major, preferential_conditions, salary, is_delete FROM notice where m_code = 'c'||#{id} order by p_date desc

SELECT a.n_code, a.m_code, a.title, a.job_type, a.personnel, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.end_date,'yy/mm/dd')) end_date, a.hour_wage, a.gender, a.age, a.term, a.work_day, a.work_time1, a.work_time2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.p_date,'yy/mm/dd')) p_date, a.viewcnt, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(a.address,0,INSTR(a.address,'/',1,2)-1),INSTR(SUBSTR(a.address,0,INSTR(a.address,'/',1,2)),'/')+1) address, a.content, a.work_place_name, a.education, a.documents, a.interview, a.contact_number, a.career, a.employment_type, a.assigned_task, a.education_etc, a.major, a.preferential_conditions, a.salary ,SUBSTR(SUBSTR(a.n_code,INSTR(n_code,'/',1)+1),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(a.n_code,INSTR(a.n_code,'/',1)+1),' ')) n_code_date, b.name, b.phone, b.email FROM notice a , member b where a.m_code = b.m_code and a.n_code = #{n_code}

SELECT a.n_code, a.m_code, a.title, a.job_type, a.personnel, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.end_date,'yy/mm/dd')) end_date, a.hour_wage, a.gender, a.age, a.term, a.work_day, a.work_time1, a.work_time2, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.p_date,'yy/mm/dd')) p_date, a.viewcnt, SUBSTR(SUBSTR(address,0,INSTR(address,'/',1,2)-1),INSTR(SUBSTR(address,0,INSTR(address,'/',1,2)),'/')+1) address, a.content, a.work_place_name, a.education, a.documents, a.interview, a.contact_number, a.career, a.employment_type, a.assigned_task, a.education_etc, a.major, a.preferential_conditions, a.salary ,SUBSTR(SUBSTR(n_code,INSTR(n_code,'/',1)+1),0,INSTR(SUBSTR(n_code,INSTR(n_code,'/',1)+1),' ')) n_code_date
FROM notice a
SELECT c.join_date,c.work_place,c.end_date, m.name FROM career c, member m WHERE c.m_code = 'ppersonal' AND c.m_code = m.m_code ORDER BY c.join_date desc

SELECT r.r_code, r.m_code, r.title, r.content, r.address, r.education, r.license, f.r_code, f.file_name, sum(w.late_status) as late_status, count(w.late_status)-sum(w.late_status) as c_late_status FROM resume r, resume_file f, work_record w WHERE r.r_code = f.r_code AND r.r_code = #{r_code} group by r.r_code, r.m_code, r.title, r.content, r.address, r.education, r.license, f.r_code, f.file_name
